Not all food is good for us.
There are foods that might taste nice...
...but they don't give our bodies any of the nutrients we need.
Instead, they contain high levels of fat or sugar.
These are foods that we need to try to eat less often.
Which do you think  are in this group?
Foods such as sweets, crisps and chocolates certainly are.
While these foods are okay to eat once in a while,...
...they can be damaging to us if we eat too much of them.
For example, too much sugar can cause a problem for our teeth.
